import React from 'react'; const CreateDevice = ({activeDevice, setActiveDevice}) => { return (
setActiveDevice(false)} style={{width:'100%', height:'100vh', top:'0', background:'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.219)'}} className={activeDevice ? 'd-flex position-fixed justify-content-center align-items-center' : 'd-none'}>

Добавить устройство

setActiveDevice(false)} style={{width:'40px', height:'40px', cursor:'pointer'}}>X
  • Action

); }; export default CreateDevice;
